H0.text: The father only is the source of genetic information of offspring produced by sexual reproduction.

H1.text: The mother only is the source of genetic information of offspring produced by sexual reproduction.

H2.text: The mother and the father are the source of genetic information of offspring produced by sexual reproduction.

H3.text: Neither the mother nor the father is the source of genetic information of offspring produced by sexual reproduction.

A4.text: Each gamete contributes half of the genetic material of the zygote.

A5.text: The nuclei from the gametes fuse.
